Flow.description: 7/7 AV- Fixed NOK issue some of the resources were off. 7/1 AV- Added "Thyroid Cancer" as an accepted cancer per criteria update. 6/19 AV- Changed "Kidney Transplant" mapping to be based of off the new mapping in 'Additional Case Detail' per D&C's request. 6/9- AV - Added "Kidney Transplant" assignment to the DQ flow. 6/5- AV- Added new PFAS DQ for prior kidney transplant if cancer is kidney cancer. 6/2- AV - fixed typo on turn down details for exposure less than 1 year. 5/27 Changed POA field to use the document 5/20 AV - Added an extra parenthesis for safety. 5/20 AV - Fixed NOK CQC it needed an "AND" statement. 5/15 RE - added non US address check and the death qualification logic 5/14 RE - added the exposure was visited logic to the Death Qualification logic 5/14 RE - changes to the Death Qualification logic with a formula time between DX & Death 5/14 RE - changed the invalid relationship logic to OR statements 5/14 RE - Added Exposure Record was visited. 5/14 RE - Added Qualified Exposure Count is Zero as another DQ 5/13 Updating Injury Record Null Path 5/12 VP - Added Disclaimer consent, Added Disqualified output variable for main CQC flow 5/10 - Added Collection filter for 1970 CQC for PFAS

formulas.name: TotalHoursUsed
TotalTimesUsed
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_First_Exposure__c})), NOT(ISBLANK( {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_Diagnosis__c})), NOT(ISBLANK( {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_Last_Exposure__c})), NOT(ISBLANK( {!Get_Campaign_Case.Number_of_Times_Used__c})), NOT(ISBLANK( {!Get_Campaign_Case.Hours_Used__c})) ), ( ( (IF( {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_Diagnosis__c} < {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_Last_Exposure__c}, {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_Diagnosis__c}, {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_Last_Exposure__c} )- {!Get_Campaign_Case.Date_of_First_Exposure__c}) / 365.25 ) * {!Get_Campaign_Case.Number_of_Times_Used__c} ) > 10, False )

Flow.label: SRLG | Questionnaire | PFAS | CQC
